refnamediv.refpurpose: Checks that a file can be read at initialisation or performance time.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns 1 if the sound file exists and is readable, or 0 if not.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifilcod -- sound file to be queried
ir -- return code (1 if the sound file ifilcod can be read).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kr -- return code (1 if the sound file ifilcod can be read).

refsect1.title: Examples
